content: TITLE: Installing and Running Chat2DB Docker Container DESCRIPTION: Commands for removing an existing Chat2DB container, running a new container with volume mapping, and starting the container. This allows users to set up Chat2DB using Docker with persistent storage. SOURCE: https://github.com/codephiliax/chat2db/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` docker rm chat2db docker run --name=chat2db -ti -p 10824:10824 -v ~/.chat2db-docker:/root/.chat2db chat2db/chat2db:latest docker start chat2db ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Chat2DB using Docker DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to install and run Chat2DB using Docker. It includes commands for pulling the latest image, running the container, and handling existing containers. SOURCE: https://github.com/codephiliax/chat2db/blob/main/README_CN.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` docker run --name=chat2db -ti -p 10824:10824 -v ~/.chat2db-docker:/root/.chat2db chat2db/chat2db:latest docker start chat2db docker rm chat2db ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Chat2DB Community Edition with Docker DESCRIPTION: Bash commands for installing and running the Chat2DB community edition using Docker. Includes steps to remove existing container, run a new container with volume mounting, and start the container. SOURCE: https://github.com/codephiliax/chat2db/blob/main/README_JA.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` docker rm chat2db docker run --name=chat2db -ti -p 10824:10824 -v ~/.chat2db-docker:/root/.chat2db chat2db/chat2db:latest docker start chat2db ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Querying Student Scores with Natural Language to SQL Conversion Example DESCRIPTION: An example SQL query generated from natural language input that retrieves scores for a student named '小明' by joining multiple tables including course, score, student, and student_course. SOURCE: https://github.com/codephiliax/chat2db/blob/main/CHAT2DB_AI_SQL.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sql CODE: ``` SELECT score.score FROM score INNER JOIN student_course ON score.course_id = student_course.course_id INNER JOIN student ON student_course.student_id = student.id WHERE student.name = '小明' ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting up Chat2DB for Local Development DESCRIPTION: This snippet provides instructions for setting up Chat2DB for local development. It includes steps for cloning the repository, running the frontend, and starting the backend server. SOURCE: https://github.com/codephiliax/chat2db/blob/main/README_CN.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` git clone git@github.com:chat2db/Chat2DB.git cd Chat2DB/chat2db-client yarn yarn run start:web cd ../chat2db-server mvn clean install cd chat2db-server/chat2db-server-start/target/ java -jar -Dloader.path=./lib -Dchatgpt.apiKey=xxxxx chat2db-server-start.jar ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Backend Development Setup DESCRIPTION: Commands for building and running the backend server. Requires Java 17+ and Maven 3.8+. Includes configuration for ChatGPT API key SOURCE: https://github.com/codephiliax/chat2db/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` $ cd ../chat2db-server $ mvn clean install # Maven version 3.8 or higher is required $ cd chat2db-server/chat2db-server-start/target/ $ java -jar -Dloader.path=./lib -Dchatgpt.apiKey=xxxxx chat2db-server-start.jar # 需要安装java 17以上版本，启动应用 chatgpt.apiKey 需要输入ChatGPT的key,如果不输入无法使用AIGC功能 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Up Backend Development Environment DESCRIPTION: Commands to set up and run the backend development environment for Chat2DB using Maven and Java. SOURCE: https://github.com/codephiliax/chat2db/blob/main/README_JA.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` $ cd ../chat2db-server $ mvn clean install # Maven version 3.8 or higher is required $ cd chat2db-server/chat2db-server-start/target/ $ java -jar -Dloader.path=./lib -Dchatgpt.apiKey=xxxxx chat2db-server-start.jar # 需要安装java 17以上版本，启动应用 chatgpt.apiKey 需要输入ChatGPT的key,如果不输入无法使用AIGC功能 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding Index to Student Table SQL Implementation DESCRIPTION: SQL commands to check for existing indexes and add a new index to improve query performance on the student table, specifically targeting the name column. SOURCE: https://github.com/codephiliax/chat2db/blob/main/CHAT2DB_AI_SQL.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: sql CODE: ``` SHOW INDEX FROM student; ``` LANGUAGE: sql CODE: ``` ALTER TABLE student ADD INDEX name_index (name); ``` LANGUAGE: sql CODE: ``` SELECT score.score FROM score INNER JOIN student ON score.student_id = student.id WHERE student.name = '小明'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Building Chat2DB for Independent Deployment DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to build Chat2DB for independent deployment. It includes steps for building the frontend and copying the necessary files to the backend resources. SOURCE: https://github.com/codephiliax/chat2db/blob/main/README_CN.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm run build:web:prod cp -r dist ../chat2db-server/chat2db-server-start/src/main/resources/static/front cp -r dist/index.html ../chat2db-server/chat2db-server-start/src/main/resources/thymeleaf ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Standalone Deployment Steps DESCRIPTION: Commands for building the production frontend and copying assets to the backend server for deployment SOURCE: https://github.com/codephiliax/chat2db/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` # chat2db-client $ npm run build:web:prod $ cp -r dist ../chat2db-server/chat2db-server-start/src/main/resources/static/front $ cp -r dist/index.html ../chat2db-server/chat2db-server-start/src/main/resources/thymeleaf ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Building and Deploying Standalone Application DESCRIPTION: Commands to build the frontend, copy files to the backend resources, and prepare for standalone deployment of Chat2DB. SOURCE: https://github.com/codephiliax/chat2db/blob/main/README_JA.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` # chat2db-client $ npm run build:web:prod $ cp -r dist ../chat2db-server/chat2db-server-start/src/main/resources/static/front $ cp -r dist/index.html ../chat2db-server/chat2db-server-start/src/main/resources/thymeleaf ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Frontend Development Setup DESCRIPTION: Commands for setting up and running the frontend development environment. Requires Node.js version 16 or higher and yarn package manager SOURCE: https://github.com/codephiliax/chat2db/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` Node version must be 16 or higher Use yarn only, npm is not supported $ cd Chat2DB/chat2db-client $ yarn $ yarn run start:web ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Up Frontend Development Environment DESCRIPTION: Commands to set up and run the frontend development environment for Chat2DB using Yarn. SOURCE: https://github.com/codephiliax/chat2db/blob/main/README_JA.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` Node version must be 16 or higher Use yarn only, npm is not supported $ cd Chat2DB/chat2db-client $ yarn $ yarn run start:web ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Cloning Chat2DB Repository DESCRIPTION: Command to clone the Chat2DB repository from GitHub to local environment SOURCE: https://github.com/codephiliax/chat2db/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` $ git clone git@github.com:chat2db/Chat2DB.git ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Cloning Chat2DB Repository DESCRIPTION: Git command to clone the Chat2DB repository locally for development purposes. SOURCE: https://github.com/codephiliax/chat2db/blob/main/README_JA.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` $ git clone git@github.com:chat2db/Chat2DB.git ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Embedding Star History Chart in HTML/Markdown DESCRIPTION: HTML code for embedding a responsive star history chart that adapts to light/dark mode preferences. The chart visualizes GitHub stars for the CodePhiliaX/chat2db repository over time. SOURCE: https://github.com/codephiliax/chat2db/blob/main/README_CN.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining URI.js License and Version in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: This code snippet defines the license and version information for the URI.js library. It specifies version 4.4.1, attributes the copyright to Gary Court, and provides a link to the full license on GitHub. SOURCE: https://github.com/codephiliax/chat2db/blob/main/chat2db-client/src/main/main.js.LICENSE.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` /** @license URI.js v4.4.1 (c) 2011 Gary Court. License: http://github.com/garycourt/uri-js */ ```
